text: allaah ne ek udaaharan[1] diya hai; ek praadheen daas hai, jo kisee cheez ka adhikaar nahin rakhata aur doosara (svaadheen) vyakti hai, jise hamane apanee or se uttam jeevika pradaan kee hai aur vah usamen chhupe aur khule vyay karata hai. kya ve donon samaan ho jaayenge? sab prashansa allaah[2] ke lie hai. balki adhiktar log (ye baat) nahin jaanate
